data.actual_result: The text gets too close to the song info area, and it can even overlap it in some cases
data.expected_result: The "Join via Desktop app" footer text should have a constant padding with the song info area
data.short_description: Spotify Listen Along embed messes up near the "Join via Desktop app" text if you mess with font size/DPI and/or if you change language with long translations
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone send a Spotify Listen Along embed in chat - Observe on Android client - Method 1: change your language to one where the header is long enough to take two lines, e.g French - Method 2: In your phone settings, set a large font size (not necessarily the maximum), and / or set a lower screen pixel density in your Android developer options
